column5: If anyone is going, please send me a PM I have a huge favor to ask  ( need a bait)
They had some at the Chicago show.
Dang! Sounds like it's right up my alley too!
you know what I am looking for eh Richard! going to be a carp to cast!
You don't cast those you lob them very gently, I'm not sure but I think they are like 2 lbs.
No kidding! good way to put out your back, got a  nice 8 foot saltwater rod just for the job  The regular ones make a big enough splash, it will be like a cow falling off a cliff into the drink
ok I need the new 26" bulldawg! its alot bigger then a pounder
